## Introduction and Data

Our topic is UFO sightings.

## Methodology
```{r}
#| label: methodology

ufo_sightings <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-06-25/ufo_sightings.csv")

glimpse(ufo_sightings)

ufo_sightings |>
  drop_na(country, encounter_length) |>
  group_by(ufo_shape) |>
  summarize(mean_time = mean(encounter_length)) 

ufo_sightings |>
  ggplot(
    aes(x = ufo_shape, y = mean_time)
  ) +
  geom_col() +
  facet_wrap(~country)+
  labs(x = "UFO Shape", title = "UFO Shape and Length in the US") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = .4, hjust = 1))
```
